message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you first for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is quite a bit higher. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I'm still a bit above my budget, can we try $110? I really think I could make good use of this product
